tit.j: 亀岡市コミュニティバス

sen.j: 亀岡市コミュニティバス（かめおかしこみゅにてぃばす）は、京都府亀岡市で運行されているコミュニティバス。
sen.e: Kameoka City Community Bus is community bus that operates in Kameoka City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kameoka City Community Bus is a community bus that operates in Kameoka City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kameoka City Community Bus is a community bus that operates in Kameoka City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 運行は京阪京都交通に委託されている。
sen.e: Operation is sub-contracted to Keihan Kyoto Kotsu.
Its operation is subcontracted to Keihan Kyoto Kotsu.
Its operation is subcontracted to Keihan Kyoto Kotsu.

sen.j: スルッとKANSAI、PiTaPa、京阪グループ共通バスカードが使用可能である。
sen.e: The following pass cards can be used: Kansai Thru Pass, PiTaPa and, Keihan Group Common Bus Cards.
sen.cmt: Kansai Thru Pass http://www.surutto.com/conts/ticket/3dayeng/index.htmlhttp://www.keihankyotokotsu.jp/fare_guide/buscard.htmlKeihan Group Common Bus Card http://www.keihankyotokotsu.jp/fare_guide/buscard.html
sen.e: The Kansai Thru Pass, PiTaPa and, Keihan Group Common Bus cards can be used.
The KANSAI THRU PASS, PiTaPa and Keihan Group Common Bus cards can be used.
sen.cmt: スルッとKANSAI→KANSAI THRU PASS としました。

sen.j: 2002年（平成14年）12月19日 運行開始。
sen.e: December 19, 2002: Service commences
December 19, 2002: Service commenced.
December 19, 2002: Service commenced.

sen.j: 2003年（平成15年）7月1日 東西コース連絡運行開始。
sen.e: July 1, 2003: East – West route commences
July 1, 2003: The East – West route became operational.
July 1, 2003: The East – West route became operational.

sen.j: 2004年（平成16年）2月1日 西左回りコース新設。
sen.e: February 1, 2004: Westward counterclockwise course reestablished.
February 1, 2004: The westward counterclockwise course was re-established.
February 1, 2004: The westward counterclockwise course was re-established.

sen.j: 2005年（平成17年）7月1日 旧京都交通 (亀岡)は京阪京都交通に営業譲渡。
sen.e: July 1, 2007: Former Kyoto Transportation (Kameoka) transfers business to Keihan Kyoto Kotsu.
July 1, 2007: The business of the former Kyoto Transportation (Kameoka) was transferred to Keihan Kyoto Kotsu.
July 1, 2005: The business of the former Kyoto Kotsu (Kameoka) was transferred to Keihan Kyoto Kotsu.
sen.cmt: Kyoto Kotsu としました。2005に修正しました。

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）3月18日 嵯峨野線ダイヤ改正に合わせて、ダイヤ改正。
sen.e: March 18, 2007: Timetable revised to fit with the revised Sagano Line timetable.
March 18, 2007: The timetable was revised to fit the revised Sagano Line timetable.
March 18, 2007: The timetable was revised to fit the revised Sagano Line timetable.

sen.j: ルートは東コース、西左回りコース、西右回りコースがある。
sen.e: Routes take an easterly course, a westward counter clockwise course and, westward clockwise course.
Routes take an easterly course, a westward counter-clockwise course and a westward clockwise course.
Routes take an easterly course, a westward counter-clockwise course and a westward clockwise course.
West Course
The west course
The westerly course:

sen.j: 亀岡駅 - 亀岡市 - 道の駅ガレリアかめおか - 緑橋 - 亀岡駅
sen.e: - Kameoka Station – Kameoka City – Kameoka Roadside Service Station – Midoribashi - Kameoka Station
- Kameoka Station – Kameoka City – Kameoka Roadside Service Station – Midoribashi - Kameoka Station
Kameoka Station – Kameoka City – Kameoka Roadside Service Station – Midoribashi - Kameoka Station
sen.cmt: 文頭のハイフンを削除しました。

sen.e: Easterly Course
The easterly course
The easterly course:
sen.cmt: コロンを追加しました。

sen.j: 亀岡駅 - 大本本部前 - 亀岡病院前 - 中矢田グリーンタウン - 古世ニュータウン - 北古世 - 亀岡駅
sen.e: - Kameoka Station – Omoto Honbu-mae – Kameoka Hospital mae – Nakayada Green Town – Kose New Town - Kita-Kose
- Kameoka Station – Omoto Honbu-mae – Kameoka Hospital mae – Nakayada Green Town – Kose New Town - Kita-Kose
Kameoka Station – Omoto Honbu-mae – Kameoka Hospital – Nakayada Green Town – Kose New Town - Kita-Kose - Kameoka Station
sen.cmt: 文頭のハイフンを削除しました。

sen.j: 100円均一の運賃、小学生以下は50円となる。
sen.e: Uniform JPY 100 fare, below elementary school age fare is JPY 50.
The uniform JPY 100 fare applies, but a fare of JPY 50 is used for children below elementary school age.
The uniform fare of 100 yen applies, but a fare of 50 yen is used for children below elementary school age.
Multi-ride tickets are also available.
Multiple-ride tickets are also available.
Multiple-ride tickets are also available.

sen.j: 運転間隔は約40分～1時間20分となっている。
sen.e: Buses run at intervals of approximately 40 minutes to 1 hour 20 minutes.
Buses run at intervals of approximately 40 minutes to 1 hour 20 minutes.
Buses run at intervals of approximately 40 minutes to 1 hour 20 minutes.

sen.j: 小型ノンステップバスを採用している。
sen.e: Small non-step buses are used.
Small, stepless buses are used.
Small, non-step buses are used.
